definition: main subject of long novel/true biography
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
The True Story of Ah Q, influential 1921 novella by Lu Xun 魯迅|鲁迅[Lu3 Xun4]

sentences.english: But back to the point. I had some money but not lots of money.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传吧，我有了一些钱，但是没有很多钱。

sentences.english: We can talk about you idea later, but now lets get back to our muttons .
sentences.chinese: 我们以后再谈你的点子，现在咱们言归正传。

sentences.english: The True Story of Ah Q combines solemnity and popularity as a model.
sentences.chinese: 阿q正传》是严肃性与通俗性相统一的典范。

sentences.english: Remeber this scene from Forest Gump?
sentences.chinese: 记得阿甘正传内的这个场景吗？

sentences.english: But let's say we wanted to calculate the energy.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我们要计算他的能量。

sentences.english: Now: I am here to teach the girl-cub to talk.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我是来教那个小姑娘说话的。

sentences.english: Joking aside, my father also noticed another interesting facet to the evening.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，家父也发现了有趣的另一面。

sentences.english: Back to the story, Recently, a lot of restaurants opens in Kepong.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，最近真的很多食店在Kepong开档了。

sentences.english: This is unofficial word of mouth, of course, does not see the True Story.
sentences.chinese: 当然此乃口口相传野史，并不见正传。

sentences.english: Jane: Tom....Let's get to the point! Where have you been last night?
sentences.chinese: 汤姆，让我们言归正传，昨晚你上哪了？

sentences.english: After the jump, we present the top five ways to create an earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 言归正传，我们展示了五种制造地震的方法。

sentences.english: To talk idly, especially to gossip.

sentences.chinese: 现在，奈保尔有了他丰碑式的正传。

sentences.english: I like Lu Xun’s works, especially The True Story of Ah Q.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢鲁迅的著作，尤其是《阿Q正传》。

sentences.english: Remember that Seinfeld episode when George was the bad boy?
sentences.chinese: 记得宋飞正传里乔治要做坏男孩的事吗？

sentences.english: I remember the sentence very clearly from the very famous film Forrest Gump .
sentences.chinese: 我记得一句非常清楚地从非常有名的电影阿甘正传。

definition: unofficial biography (as opposed to official dynastic biography)
to tell others (a secret)/to divulge to an outsider/to be rumored
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
your work (book, musical composition etc) (honorific)/to erupt/to begin abruptly
(old) works of literature, including novels, plays etc
behind-the-scenes story/details known only to insiders
